description:
The Deluxe Version for
Nintendo 3DS™ of the successful
Zombie Panic in Wonderland!

Don’t miss it! The game is completely
renewed for this version!

- Amazing graphics!

- Extra stages and extended story!

- Exclusive enemies!

- You can use 2 different control
systems which are perfectly adapted
for the console!

- Maximized playability

Let’s set out on a grand adventure to
save the Wonderland from the zombies
destroying all in your way!
name:
Zombie Panic in Wonderland
DX
